name: Pacira BioSciences, Inc.
description: Pacira BioSciences, Inc. is a leading pharmaceutical company dedicated to innovative solutions in post-surgical pain management. Founded in 2006 and headquartered in Parsippany, New Jersey, Pacira has developed a unique platform of products designed to improve the treatment of pain while minimizing the reliance on opioids. The company’s flagship product, EXPAREL, is a long-acting local anesthetic that provides effective pain control while reducing the need for opioids in the postoperative setting. This innovative approach not only enhances patient recovery but also contributes to the ongoing efforts to combat the opioid crisis. Pacira continues to expand its product portfolio through research and development, focusing on delivering transformative products that address unmet medical needs in pain management and anesthesia. The company is also engaged in collaborations and partnerships to further advance its mission and bring new therapeutic options to market. With a commitment to improving patient outcomes and quality of life, Pacira is at the forefront of redefining pain management practices in healthcare.
